overall_desc:
This is a series of challenges, each with a particular budget and a target sub-metric. Your job is to tune the knobs, to find the right knob settings so that the sub-metric value can be as close as possible to the target. 

*For fairness purposes, the knob values will be reset to a random state at the beginning of each challenge

challenge_list.name: ferret
challenge_list.desc: Your target is to tune the two knobs to make sub-metric RANKING as close as possible to 1.354

challenge_list.name: ferret
challenge_list.desc: Your target is to tune the two knobs to make sub-metric COVERAGE as close as possible to 0.9852

challenge_list.name: ferret
challenge_list.desc: Remember, you should tune the knob so that the sub-metric does not exceed the target

challenge_list.name: ferret
challenge_list.desc: Similar to the one before, tune it to as close as possible to the target

challenge_list.name: ferret
challenge_list.desc: This is your last challenge, finish it and load in the new challenge file
